statements: UPDATE bar_sales SET drink_price = 5.50 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE bar_sales SET total_sales = quantity * drink_price WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE bar_sales SET drink_price = drink_price * 1.1, total_sales = quantity * drink_price WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE bar_sales SET total_sales = quantity * drink_price * 1.15 WHERE drink_name = 'Martini';
